# William Huddleston (colonial administrator)

William Huddleston, CSI (c. 1826â€“1894) was a British colonial administrator who acted as the Governor of Madras from 24 May 1881 to 5 November 1881.
He was made a CSI in 1882.

* [https://www.worldstatesmen.org/India_BrProvinces.htm#Madras List of Governors of Madras], Worldstatesmen.org
